skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Slayers are constantly looking for the most glorious death in battle against the largest creatures, including dragons.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Slayer Units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
This drengi’s scars are so numerous that even the legends do not account for all of them. His skin has toughened beyond that of a normal dwarf, allowing him to battle through terrible wounds.
Every dwarf child will hear of my tales. Perhaps there is room in a song for your names as well.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Wholly dedicated to destroying enemies of the dawi, wherever they may be.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Yes... YES! That one should do!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
How could a solo combatant triumph against such odds again and again? He must be descended from Grimnir himself. (Ungrim campaign only skill)
There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +6% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Stopping only briefly to remove some of the blood-thickened fur from his blades, the slayer is otherwise able to maintain a ferocious whirlwind when fighting the puny ratmen. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Empire
	(all armies factionwide)

Bonus vs Infantry: +4 when fighting against Skaven
	(all armies factionwide)

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Empire
	(all armies factionwide)

Bonus vs Infantry: +8 when fighting against Skaven
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: After taking the slayer oath, this dwarf spent years slaying squigs, trolls, and of course grobi by the dozens. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +2 when fighting against Ogres
	(all armies factionwide)

Charge bonus: +20% when fighting against Greenskin Tribes
	(all armies factionwide)

Bonus vs Large: +4 when fighting against Ogres
	(all armies factionwide)

Charge bonus: +40% when fighting against Greenskin Tribes
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: To combat chaos and its minions is a rare opportunity for a slayer. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos
	(all armies factionwide)

Charge bonus: +5% when fighting against Kislev
	(all armies factionwide)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +8 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos
	(all armies factionwide)

Charge bonus: +10% when fighting against Kislev
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Listen up hazkal drengi, there is a time for rage and a time for patience. The undead do not tire, they do not fear. Take your time, and slaughter the lot of them. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 when fighting against Undead
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Undead
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Slaying a creature of that size would make for a great story, and an even better song. Now… get out of my way. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +2 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile strength: +10% when fighting against Beastmen
	(all armies factionwide)

Bonus vs Large: +4 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile strength: +20% when fighting against Beastmen
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Those elgram fools think their magic will save them? (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -5% when fighting against Cathay
	(all armies factionwide)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

Vigour loss reduction: -10% when fighting against Cathay
	(all armies factionwide)

Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against High Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: I hope a few of their arrows get through. I’ll be shoving them where the bryn doesn’t shine. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile resistance: 10% when fighting against Wood Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(all armies factionwide)

Missile resistance: 20% when fighting against Wood Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Scarred, and fueled by a slayer’s anger, this dawi embraces the biting cold with naught but dwarven ale to warm his bones. (Ungrim campaign only skill)

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 when fighting against Norsca
	(all armies factionwide)

Physical resistance: 5% when fighting against Dark Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Norsca
	(all armies factionwide)

Physical resistance: 10% when fighting against Dark Elves
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: I have fought trolls, giants, and yes, even a dragon. And you think a wazzok like you can slay me? Ha!
Wiping the sides of his blades through his slayer crest, the drengi can then ignite his az’s for even greater slaughter, especially against trolls.

effects.description:
Enemy vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Traditionally slayers worship Grimnir alone, but if on their quest they come across lost rune-weapons, they can honor the God of Runic Magic by slaying urks with a weapon of power.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Slayers forsake any semblance of armor which might hamper their ability to kill. A nogarung for ale, and a few other skulls and bones commemorating past battles isn’t out of the question though.
A veteran of countless battles, this drengi knows when to strike and when to breathe.
A glorious death in battle, that is all a slayer desires. To see the end of a legend is inspiring to all dawi.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Although it irks them, slayers of this renown attract a following of younger slayers, hoping to learn from them and follow in their great footsteps.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Slayer units
	(all armies factionwide)
Leadership aura size: +100% for Lords when attacking

Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for Slayers units (minimum 1)
	(factionwide)
